title: Give Me a Word: The Collective Soul Story
overview: Filmed at Elvis' Palm Springs getaway in early 2023, and containing archival footage from the band's early days, "Give Me a Word: The Collective Soul Story" is the definitive feature-length documentary on Collective Soul. Currently in their 31st year, "Give Me a Word" tells the untold story, the family component to the band, the creativity, and the wisdom that has been hard won over a three decades plus career.
